Title: Son of Babylon
Writer: Mohamed Al Daradji, Mithal Ghazi, Jennifer Norridge (screenplay)
Actors: Shazada Hussein, Yasser Talib, Bashir Al Majid, Salih Abdul Rahman Farhad
Plot: A willful young boy follows his just as obstinate grandmother in a journey across Iraq, determined to discover the fate of her missing son, Ahmed's father, who never returned from war.
Country: Iraq, UK, France, Netherlands, United Arab Emirates, Egypt, Palestine
